snippet.title: DAVIGO - Gameplay Trailer | 2-player VR vs PC Showdown
snippet.description:
Add to your Steam wishlist!
► https://store.steampowered.com/app/1116540/Davigo/
Sign up for the upcoming closed beta!
► http://davigogame.com/
Follow development as it progresses.
► https://twitter.com/DavigoGame
Join our discord!
► https://discord.gg/5du5Ack

DAVIGO is a 2-player game that pits a VR player against a PC player in an epic showdown of strength and skill. The VR player is colossal giant; the PC player a tiny warrior.


• gamepad by Milinda Courey from the Noun Project
• vr by Curve from the Noun Project
